column4: nothingalspecial: ok. I want to use SCSI3 and #3 with the status primary. But when i click enter, it just says that the partition if formatted with ntfs and i get some options
you must have formatted the partition earlier when installing windows. just format it if you are sure that it is not the windows partition
what do you mean? It is formatted from windtows to NTFS. Doenst that work?
yes it does. delete it and format it as ext4
are you sure it's not the windows one?
yes i am very sure :) so now it says pri/log and that is free space. Should i just click enter now?
yes. format it as ext4, set as bootable and mount point as /
also you need one more partition as swap
should i use Primare or logical? Got those two options
primary
primary for swap also
ok. Now should i choose "done setting up the partition? Or what?
yes
did you set it as bootable and the mount point as /
i didnt really get to choose. Says mount options are defaults, and bootable flag is off..
select the partition again
the select the mount point
set it as /
it already was set as such.
ok. now set it as bootable
How?! Because when i click bootable flag it just loads for a second and then it just says "off" still.
you should be able to set the partition as bootable
fuck this alternate version.. I'm so close to just download the normal version again.. The reason i took this one is because the normal one was so slow. This is now worth it.
ok
